Package com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.testapp.activity.maplayout

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BottomSheetActivity
    Test activity showcasing using a bottomView with a MapView and stacking map fragments below.
    BottomSheetActivity.BottomSheetFragment  
    BottomSheetActivity.MainMapFragment  
    DebugModeActivity
    Test activity showcasing the different debug modes and allows to cycle between the default map styles.
    DoubleMapActivity
    Test activity showcasing having 2 maps on top of each other.
    DoubleMapActivity.DoubleMapFragment
    Custom fragment containing 2 MapViews.
    LatLngBoundsForCameraActivity
    Test activity showcasing restricting user gestures to a bounds around Iceland, almost worldview and IDL.
    LocalGlyphActivity
    Test activity that displays the city of Suzhou with a mixture of server-generated latin glyphs and CJK glyphs generated locally using "Droid Sans" as a font family.
    MapChangeActivity
    Test activity showcasing how to listen to map change events.
    MapInDialogActivity
    Test activity showcasing showing a Map inside of a DialogFragment.
    MapInDialogActivity.MapDialogFragment  
    MapPaddingActivity
    Test activity showcasing using the map padding API.
    SimpleMapActivity
    Test activity showcasing a simple MapView without any MapboxMap interaction.
    VisibilityChangeActivity
    Test activity showcasing visibility changes to the mapview.
